title: Super Fine
comment: To be able to remotely operate the display monitors in our sanctuary is fabulous. Being able to remotely operate them from my phone is fantastic. I would recommend  the Openlp software, along with the Openlp app, to anybody needing this type of projection software. This stuff is not only easy to use, it is also free. I've been using Openlp for a few years now, just recently this remote app on my phone and I wouldn't trade it for anything else. Thank You Openlp team, and keep up the great work.

title: P R O B L E M S
comment: DON'T KNOW HOW TO CONNECT IT TO MY COMPUTER ??

title: Great church app
comment: We love it

title: Can't media files from remote app
comment: When a media file is attached to a slide, remote app has no way of playing the file.
Super, usefull app for our church!
OpenLP is the best.

title: Excellence in Service
comment: Have used OpenLP for several years now with great success. I use multiple instances of this remote display app to run several flat panel TV monitors for stage view, pulpit view and lyric display to the assembly. Several choir members run it on their own tablets. It performs wonderfully. Great work, thank you!

title: Chevere
comment: Me encanta

title: Works well
comment: The app works like a charm. It even works well while on phone tethering. Great job guys!!

title: It's a blessing
comment: We should give this developers some type of support for their awesome work.

title: Great for leading services
comment: Also stage screen etc. How do you set timed advance from this app?

title: Brilliant
comment: For free? Impressive. One criticism: need to be able to search scripture verse from the app.

title: Great App!!
comment: Our church just started using this in pur worship service. We love it.
Thank you!

title: Tops
comment: For a free software package, it is a very well designed and programmed presentation package. The fully functioning remote is the "cherry on top"

title: Interesting yet complicated to handle.
comment: Interesting app but handling instructions are needed as the format is different from the app in the PC.
Bad app

title: Thank You
comment: This is such a beautiful app for visiting speakers.  I love it!
Works great with Ubuntu 13.04 I'll be testing with windows 7 or 8 soon.

title: Excellent
comment: Great

title: Not working
comment: My samsung note 7100 is not connecting to the IP address. Pls help!

title: Excellent App!!!
comment: Great functionality, basic but useful for sure. The only thing that's missing here is the ability to look up scripture from it.

title: Brilliant
comment: I use this for controlling openlp from the congregation and also for adding songs to service list while practising with the singers at the front. Rock solid, never crashes. Just wish the stage view included slide previews.

title: Love it
comment: Our church just started using this for youth group and will soon be using it during regular services

comment: Really handy app, surprisingly stable! :-)

title: Best Free Display Software
comment: As good as any of the pay software's out there, but for FREE! GREAT SOFTWARE!

title: This finalized my decision to use openlp
comment: Great work on an android app! Now if we can get smooth video streaming on live view, we can hook up a remote android device to our projector, and we will be done :D

title: Love!!
comment: When i found out about this i was like... YES!! :D

title: Awesome
comment: I have tried various pricy worship software.  By fast OpenLP is equally as compatible.  The remote feature works wonderfully with every aspect of the service. Best of all it is completely FREE.  Thankyou!

comment: Very nice

title: Awesome !!!
comment: Awesome enhancement to an already great piece of software.

title: Wow! - in combination with Ubuntu laptop
comment: Exactly what we need in the worship service! At the moment 4 stars for ease of use, but 5 stars for the price of the whole package.
Best in presentation software

title: Fantastic!
comment: Update for version .5:  brilliant work. The niggles are gone!  Old review:  Wonderful work, thank you! A.d. few niggles, such as having to change tabs to blank the screen/move between service items, but these are just niggles....  God bless!

title: Genius!
comment: Thank You for this awesome app!

title: Missing the top tabs
comment: Navigating just got more difficult .... would be nice if it would go to live view on single tap since it sends the song immediately anyway.

title: Great tool
comment: We have a small church and we love openlp...this tool is icing on the cake :-)

title: A Happy Customer
comment: Nice job! Keep up the good work. New features are welcome.

title: Great job
comment: Perfect! Would be nice if it had an option to stop the screen blackout
Excellent for changing song slides when in the band. If you have old pre-market version installed, uninstall it first to get rid of package sign error

title: Installation error
comment: Error on installing: "Package file was not signed correctly".
